```{r setup}
library(densityarea)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(purrr)
library(forcats)
library(sf)
library(ggplot2)
library(ggdensity)

data(s01)
```

```{r}
head(s01)
```

```{r}
s01 |> 
  ggplot(
    aes(
      x = F2,
      y = F1
    )
  )+
    stat_hdr(probs = c(0.5, 0.95))+
    scale_y_reverse()+
    scale_x_reverse()
```

```{r}
s01 |> 
  group_by(name) |> 
  summarise(
    polys = density_polygons(log(F2), log(F1), probs = c(0.5, 0.8), as_sf = F)
  ) |> 
  unnest(polys) |> 
  ggplot(
    aes(
      `log(F2)`,
      `log(F1)`
    )
  )+
    geom_point()+
    facet_wrap(~prob)+
    scale_x_reverse()+
    scale_y_reverse()
```
